title: Vikings star Alicia Agneson drops season 6 teaser and hints at her new character
text:
Alicia Agneson dropped another hint about Vikings season 6 (Picture: Getty/@aliciaagneson/Instagram)

Vikings star Alicia Agneson has dropped a brand new teaser about her involvement in season six.

Alicia caused some confusion earlier this year when she hinted she would be returning to the show in a brand new role, despite her character Freydis being brutally killed off by Ivar The Boneless in season five.

The actress can’t wait to reveal her character to fans, who with her long dark hair has a very different look to Freydis.

In an Instagram selfie, Alicia is decked out in her costume – including a huge furry hat and a high-neck dress – staring fiercely into the camera.

She teased that ‘things are about to go down’ in the final season, and her mysterious character might be in the middle of all the drama.

The 23-year-old wrote: ‘Isn’t it just bloody fantastic that Season 6 of @historyvikings airs 4th of December??? I am beyond excited to show you who this lady in the photo is. Things are about to go down. Like deep down. Are you ready?’

Fans have already created theories about who Alicia might be, including Freydis’ twin sister who will be out for revenge on Ivar.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Another theory suggests she is returning to the show as someone new and unconnected to Freydis – the wife of Oleg the prophet.

The new season of the History Channel show will kick off with a bumper two-hour episode according to star Alexander Ludwig.

Addressing his 2.2million followers on Instagram, Alexander Ludwig revealed: ‘Vikings is back and more intense than ever premiering for two hours on December 4th 9/8c on @historytv@historyvikings.

Who is her mysterious new character? (Picture: Alicia Agneson/Instagram)

‘I hope you are all as excited as I am for the epic ending all our amazing fans deserve. But before that..it gets insane…. so much love to you all.’

Meanwhile, Alexander’s co-stars Katheryn Winnick and Alex Høgh Andersen have teased their favourite scenes from the upcoming season, which includes an ‘epic’ battle.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Katheryn, who plays Lagertha, said: ‘I guess my most memorable battle has to be Lagertha’s next battle in season six.

‘It is epic, took weeks to rehearse, lots of blood, sweat and tears.

‘It is definitely going to be something you have never seen before.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Alex added: ‘My favourite battle scene when shooting Vikings is from an episode called Homeland.

‘My character, Ivar The Boneless, is charging into battle, and he’s really eager to get there, and yet when he finally arrives he gets knocked off the chariot.

‘Straight away he finds himself all along on the battlefield, facing a hundred Saxon soldiers.’

Vikings returns Wednesday 4th December on the History Channel.

description: Vikings star Alicia Agneson drops season 6 teaser and hints at her new character despite being killed off in season 5
